name: HyperComments
overview:
Unlike traditional comment systems the HyperComments technology allows commenting on a specific word or a text fragment.

How Hypercomments work:

  1. Reader selects and comments on the text fragment.
  2. The fragment will be highlighted and then becomes clickable and more attractive.
  3. Hypercomments will attract attention of new readers and commentators.

Benefits for web-site owners: Text becomes interactive Comments are tied to the context Enrichment the text of the article by readers Increasing the number of comments Visualization of the “hot zones” in text Cross-posting of comments to social networks

Benefits for your readers: Interaction with the text Commenting on the interesting text fragment Visualization of the “hot zones” of other readers Interaction with other readers Cross-posting of comments to social networks

HyperComments Features: Commenting on a text fragment Real-time comments Comments indexable by search engines Import/Export of existing comments No registration is required Social integration (authorisation and cross-posting of comments) RSS option Anti spam protection Whitelist / blacklist Real-time moderation
